author: jdotpz
content:
#The Way Webmaker Downtime Looked Today
We ran into a couple issues on webmaker.org apps today, resulting from a couple recent changes to the login server app.
Here's how it all looked.
*App response time vs. db performance (how we figured out what the issue was to start)
